description: /etc/passwd file permission rights misconfiguration and subsequent privilege escalation
goal:
Explore various methods to escalate privileges on a linux machine exploiting misconfigurations of permissions on the /etc/passwd file

This Lab was modeled after the following article: https://www.hackingarticles.in/editing-etc-passwd-file-for-privilege-escalation/
solution:
Access the ssh client in interactive mode

SSH inside the vulnerable container

$ ssh user1@193.20.1.3

The password is "pass123"

Follow the guide at https://www.hackingarticles.in/editing-etc-passwd-file-for-privilege-escalation/ and explore different ways to gain root access.
